did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Words of the World's Children Collection, 1979-2015.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Includes tapes and records concerning language development in children.

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: This collection consists of audio and audio-visual recordings, and records of child language. It is cross-linguistic with assessments in each language which are comparable across languages.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Includes tapes and records concerning language development in children.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: New York State College of Human Ecology.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Words of the World's Children Collection, #8525. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.
